sentences.en: "Steve, what do you want?" — "Coke, Pepsi, it doesn't matter."
sentences.cn: “史蒂夫，你要喝点什么？”——“可口可乐，百事，随便啦。”

sentences.en: Can I have a Diet Coke?
sentences.cn: 能给我来一罐低热量可乐吗？

sentences.en: Coal is destructively distilled leaving a solid residue, coke.
sentences.cn: 煤被干馏后剩下固体残余物:焦炭.

sentences.en: Coke burns with oxygen to give carbon dioxide.
sentences.cn: 焦碳用氧气燃烧,产生二氧化碳.

sentences.en: Coke is an economical fuel but it leaves a lot of ash.
sentences.cn: 焦炭是一种很经济的燃料,可是燃烧后剩下很多灰.

sentences.en: Coke is used as fuel and in making steel.
sentences.cn: 焦炭被用作燃料和制造钢铁.

sentences.en: Darby was looking for a way to improve iron when he hit upon the idea of smelting it with coke instead of charcoal.
sentences.cn: 达比一直在寻找改善铁质的方法，他猛然想到可以不用木炭熔炼，而改用焦炭。

sentences.en: He was still hanging around, swigging the Coke out of the can.
sentences.cn: 他还在闲逛，拿着一罐可乐大口大口地喝着。

sentences.en: I slaked my thirst with three cans of Coke.
I'll have a coke float please.
sentences.cn: 请来一杯带冰淇淋的可口可乐.

sentences.en: In a consumer taste test, Coke went up against Pepsi.
sentences.cn: 在一次消费者品尝测验中, 可口可乐与百事可乐交锋了.

sentences.en: Is this world nothing but a barren lump of coke?
sentences.cn: 难道这个世界只是一片荒芜,一堆煤炭?

sentences.en: The children kept dripping Coke on the carpets.
sentences.cn: 孩子们老往地毯上滴可乐。

sentences.en: Using coke in iron ore reduction produces copious quantities of airborne particulates.
sentences.cn: 炼铁过程中使用焦炭,会在空中形成大量的悬浮粒子.

trans.tran_en: a solid black substance produced from coal and burned to provide heat
